Staked(address,bytes32,address,uint256,u.details: emitted when user stakes an asset

params.amount: of the asset that was staked

Unstaked(address,bytes32,address,uint256.details: emitted when user unstakes an asset

params.amount: of the asset that was unstaked
amount of AVAX to be staked*
amount of sAVAX to be staked*
amount of TJ_AVAX_USDC to be staked*
amount of AVAX to be unstaked*

stakeAVAXYak(uint256).notice: Stakes AVAX in Yield Yak protocol

stakeSAVAXYak(uint256).notice: Stakes sAVAX in Yield Yak protocol

stakeTJAVAXUSDCYak(uint256).notice: Stakes TJ_AVAX_USDC in Yield Yak protocol

unstakeAVAXYak(uint256).notice: Unstakes AVAX from Yield Yak protocol
